com.github.sworisbreathing.sfmf4j.api
Interface DirectoryListener

All Known Implementing Classes:
DirectoryListenerAdapter
public interface DirectoryListener

Interface for callbacks invoked when a directory's contents have changed. Developers are encouraged to extend DirectoryListenerAdapter if they only need to implement a subset of this interface's callbacks.

Author:
Steven Swor

Method Summary
 void fileChanged(File changed)
          Callback invoked when a change to a file is detected.
 void fileCreated(File created)
          Callback invoked when a new file is detected.
 void fileDeleted(File deleted)
          Callback invoked when a file in a directory is no longer detected.

Parameters:

fileDeleted

Callback invoked when a file in a directory is no longer detected.
